EmailTemplate.name: HeadStart travel bursary 2015 Birmingham Q
EmailTemplate.subject: HeadStart travel bursary application
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
HeadStart | The Challenge
HeadStart travel bursary application
Dear {!Contact.FirstName}
Thank you for applying to be part of HeadStart.
We understand from your application form that you would like to request a HeadStart travel bursary. Travel bursaries are there to support volunteers who would not otherwise be able to cover their travel costs to attend volunteering placements.
To apply for your travel bursary please complete this form
By filling out this form we are not guaranteeing that you will be eligible for a travel bursary and further communication with your parent/guardian may be required.
If you have any questions please don't hesitate to contact us at:
headstart@the-challenge.org.
The HeadStart team
